completeListOfAbilities.name: Apocalypse

2-hit group magic  PG attack + group  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns Griever Magics; 2 turns special effect Junction Griever
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoningã€? support
All actions have instant turn rateã€? do not add to turn count while special effect Junction Griever active; does consume turn during summoningã€? support
